description: Traffic had been restricted to northbound traffic as part of works to refurbish the seafront.
title: Douglas Promenade: Two-way traffic resumes as work continues
title_page: Douglas Promenade: Two-way traffic resumes as work continues - BBC News
maintext: Work on the promenade began in 2018 and was originally scheduled to finish in October but is now due to be completed in March 2021.
